name: Crashmoon
description:
C    R

                                A    S    H

            M

                            O    O    N

Crashmoon is weird fantasy system neutral archepelagio crawl. No matter what game you use it with, it's never the wrong time to talk to your group about satefy tools like Session Zero, Lines and Veils, the X, N and O cards, and Open Doors.

Crashmoon is a #SwordDream
